remarks: The division algorithm for ordinal exponentiation.  (This version of ~ oeeu gives an explicit expression for the unique solution of the equation, in terms of the solution ` P ` to ~ omeu .)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)
statement:
oeeu.1 $e |- X = U. |^| { x e. On | B e. ( A ^o x ) } $.
oeeu.2 $e |- P = ( iota w E. y e. On E. z e. ( A ^o X ) ( w = <. y , z >. /\ ( ( ( A ^o X ) .o y ) +o z ) = B ) ) $.
oeeu.3 $e |- Y = ( 1st ` P ) $.
oeeu.4 $e |- Z = ( 2nd ` P ) $.
oeeui $p |- ( ( A e. ( On \ 2o ) /\ B e. ( On \ 1o ) ) -> ( ( ( C e. On /\ D e. ( A \ 1o ) /\ E e. ( A ^o C ) ) /\ ( ( ( A ^o C ) .o D ) +o E ) = B ) <-> ( C = X /\ D = Y /\ E = Z ) ) ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w x y z $.
$d X w y z $.
